segments.text: New York Airport.May I help you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . I am calling to make sure if flight CG877 will arrive on time ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Hold on a moment please ... Sorry , the flight from London has been delayed . It departed two hours later than scheduled.The whether in London was really bad .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You mean it will arrive two hours later than usual ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: So far we could only deduce this way.If you want further information , would you please call us 1 hour later ?
segments.speaker: S1
